long_description: A hydration reservoir designed to firmly mount to the deck of your kayak, the Camebak Cortez(TM) offers 70 fl. oz. of hydration capacity to quench your thirst while paddling. 70 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir is equipped with the Quick Link(TM) connection system for hassle-free removal of the drinking tube. Big Bite(TM) valve is ergonomically positioned for easy drinking. Wide-mouth port cuts weight and makes it easy to fill and clean the reservoir; quick-snap cap tightens in just a quarter turn. You can easily fill reservoir without removing it from the hydration pack. Camelbak Cortez features an insulated tube cover to keep water cool on hot days. Stretchy bungee stores extra gear.
short_description: A hydration reservoir designed to firmly mount to the deck of your kayak, the Camebak Cortez(TM) offers 70 fl. oz. of hydration capacity to quench your thirst while paddling.
